column16: Text Blob
Ongoing: Cancel all but 1 Red

While on deck: If you Spoil, gain 2 points and take another turn

When played: You may turn your token to the active side

Harvest: Gain 1 mana per card less than 7 in your field

If you spoil, leave this card in your field as the first card

When Bought: Claim any advancement costing 1 to 6
